title: My patcher is stuck, and wont move past this screen

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: My patcher is stuck and will not load anymore. I've tried reinstalling and everything i could find on these forums from someone with a similar issue. Pls help I just wanna play league :(

replies.body: There's a chance that your client isn't loading properly if your network can't make a solid connection to our servers. Let's cover all our bases by making sure you've set up your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in the best way for League to load, but let me know if none of those steps are helping!
